properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ROWN , FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , FC_SEAT_TYPE , U_ID , R_NAME , U_PHONE , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , FC_STATUS FROM ( SELECT FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , DECODE(FC_NAME, '독서실', '일일권', '멀티코트장', DECODE(FC_SEAT_NO, 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C')) AS FC_SEAT_TYPE , U_ID , R_NAME , U_PHONE , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , FC_STATUS FROM FACILITY JOIN MEMBER USING(U_NO) JOIN INFO_RESIDENT USING(R_NO) ORDER BY FC_DATE DESC ) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ROWN , FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , FC_SEAT_TYPE , U_ID , R_NAME , U_PHONE , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , FC_STATUS FROM ( SELECT FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , DECODE(FC_NAME, '독서실', '일일권', '멀티코트장', DECODE(FC_SEAT_NO, 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C')) AS FC_SEAT_TYPE , U_ID , R_NAME , U_PHONE , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , FC_STATUS FROM FACILITY JOIN MEMBER USING(U_NO) JOIN INFO_RESIDENT USING(R_NO) ORDER BY FC_DATE DESC ) ) WHERE ROWN BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ROWN , FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , FC_SEAT_TYPE , U_ID , R_NAME , U_PHONE , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , FC_STATUS FROM ( SELECT FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , DECODE(FC_NAME, '독서실', '일일권', '멀티코트장', DECODE(FC_SEAT_NO, 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C')) AS FC_SEAT_TYPE , U_ID , R_NAME , U_PHONE , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , FC_STATUS FROM FACILITY JOIN MEMBER USING(U_NO) JOIN INFO_RESIDENT USING(R_NO) ORDER BY FC_DATE DESC )
